import React from "react"; import axios from "axios"; const baseURL = "https://wytnomo.herokuapp.com/api/users"; class Register extends React.Component { submit = e=>{ console.log( this.props.state()) this.props.instance.post("/user/register", this.props.state()) .then(response => response) .then((response) => { if (response.status == 200){ this.props.nextStep("home") } alert(response.data.message+" "+ response.status ) console.log(response.data) this.props.nextStep("register") }) .catch(error =>{ console.log('error', error)}); this.props.nextStep("register") } render() { return (

STUDENT REGISTRATION FORM

{this.props.mssge}


) } } export default Register;
